dataTypes.name: Cost Centers
dataTypes.query: SELECT COST_CENTER_NUMBER as value, COST_CENTER_NUMBER || ' - ' || COST_CENTER_NAME as label FROM FINANCE_AND_ACCOUNTING.golden.cost_center WHERE (? = '' OR UPPER(COST_CENTER_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(COST_CENTER_NUMBER) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(COST_CENTER_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%')) ORDER BY COST_CENTER_NUMBER LIMIT 100

dataTypes.name: WBS Elements
dataTypes.query: SELECT WBS_NUMBER as value, WBS_NUMBER || ' - ' || WBS_DESCRIPTION as label FROM FINANCE_AND_ACCOUNTING.golden.wbs WHERE (? = '' OR UPPER(WBS_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(WBS_NUMBER) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%')) ORDER BY WBS_NUMBER LIMIT 100
